function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pandemic speeding up progress towards social fairness and environment protection","Impact":"Potential disruption to existing social and environmental structures","Mitigation":"Implement measures to support and protect marginalized communities and vulnerable ecosystems","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, sustainable infrastructure, environmental monitoring technologies","People":"Marginalized communities, vulnerable ecosystems","Owner":"Government, NGOs, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Adverse effects of counter-pandemic measures on sustainable development goals","Impact":"Reversal of progress towards lower poverty and misery, deprivation of education","Mitigation":"Invest in alternative education solutions, support marginalized communities, and promote sustainable development initiatives","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, sustainable development tools, community development technologies","People":"Marginalized communities, children, individuals in poverty","Owner":"Educational institutions, government, NGOs"}]}
